text: Nebusaradan Jeremaia ataghizɨ a fɨriaghɨrɨgha zuir dughiamɨn, Ikiavɨra Itir God akam isa Jeremaia ganɨngi. Babilonia Jeremaia ko, Judaba ko, Jerusalemia inigha senbar me ike, egh men aku kalabus bagh Babilonɨn mangam. Egha me Raman nguibamɨn otivir dughiamɨn, gumazir dapanir faragha zuim Nebusaradan, Jeremaian garima a me ko iti, ezɨ a anetaghizɨ a fɨriaghɨrɨgha ghu.
